scripts.pantograph.build: cd packages/pantograph && npm run build && npm run build-standalone && cp -f dist/index.html ../../public/pantograph.html && cp -f dist/pantograph.js ../../public/pantograph.js && cp -f dist/pantograph.css ../../public/pantograph.css && rm -rf ../../public/Tutorial && cp -rf dist/Tutorial ../../public/Tutorial && rm -rf dist/Lib ../../public/Lib && cp -rf dist/Lib ../../public/Lib
scripts.demonaco.build: pnpm run demonaco.backend.build && pnpm run demonaco.parser.build
scripts.packages.build: pnpm run pantograph.build && pnpm run demonaco.build
scripts.build: pnpm run packages.build && vite build && rm -rf docs && cp -rf dist docs
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/ docs/ public/Lib public/Tutorial public/pantograph*
